dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4042 IH: District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To amend title 11, District of Columbia Official Code, to prohibit the exclusion of individuals from service on a District of Columbia jury on account of sexual orientation or gender identity.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Local Juror Non-Discrimination Act of 2023.

section.header: Exclusion from District of Columbia juries on account of sexual orientation or gender identity prohibited

subsection.text: Section 11–1903, District of Columbia Official Code, is amended by inserting (including sexual orientation or gender identity) after sex.
Section 11–1910(c), District of Columbia Official Code, is amended by inserting (including sexual orientation or gender identity) after sex.
